hero.question: US strikes Iran by March 7, 2026?
hero.prob_take: Traders are pricing a roughly 1-in-3 shot at US strikes on Iran before March, though sentiment cooled 9 points in the last day. The real tell will be whether Iran's nuclear program escalates or regional tensions simmer down, either of which could swing this 28% odds significantly.

daily_take.headline: War fever cools as Iran strike odds plunge 9 points overnight
daily_take.deck: The odds of US military action against Iran by March dropped from 37.5% to 28.5% in 24 hours, signaling a sharp pivot in trader sentiment. Markets are pricing in either diplomatic backchannels working or the Trump administration deciding the political cost outweighs the benefit. Either way, the prediction markets just told you something cable news hasn't figured out yet.
